title: Monica Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Monica Concert Tickets for her 2015 “The Cod Red Experience” Tour Dates for Cities like Las Vegas, Orlando, and Memphis
text:
Monica concert tickets for her 2015 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Las Vegas, Orlando, and Memphis. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Monica fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a vast selection of Monica concert tickets at affordable prices. Monica is hitting the road in 2015 with her “The Cod Red Experience” tour and kicking it all off on October 10th in Cambridge, MA.
She will be out in support of their new album, Code Red.
CLICK HERE to browse all levels of seating for Monica concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
CapitalCityTickets.com stocks all levels of seating and price ranges to all Monica concerts!
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Monica concert tickets for shows nationwide. CapitalCityTickets.com also offers a safe online buying experience for Monica tickets.
